spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sirene's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The sirene can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The sirene has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sirene makes two dagger attacks or two shortbow attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@dice 1d4 + 4})

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.
